Title: Kinban
Description:
Kinect + TFS

This is a WPF representation of a Kanban board that can be manipulated with the Kinect.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Kinect + TFS

This is a WPF representation of a Kanban board that can be manipulated with the Kinect.

Pre-Requisites
  • AutoIt V3 - http://www.autoitscript.com/site/autoit/downloads/
  • Kinect SDK - http://kinectforwindows.org/download/
  • Team Foundation Server client - Included as part of your Visual Studio Premium installation
